meanings.definition: The rear part of a ship's upper deck.
meanings.sent1: The sailors gathered at the tafferel to enjoy the view of the sea.
meanings.sent2: The captain stood proudly at the tafferel, overseeing the crew's work.
meanings.sent3: The seagull perched on the tafferel, pretending to be the ship's lookout.
meanings.sent4: The tafferel gleamed in the sunlight, a beacon of elegance on the ship.
meanings.sent5: The tafferel creaked under the weight of the sailors, a sturdy perch above the waves.

meanings.definition: A small ornamental structure on a ship's stern.
meanings.sent1: The golden tafferel added a touch of luxury to the ship's stern.
meanings.sent2: The intricate carvings on the tafferel depicted mythical sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sailor hung a tiny flag on the tafferel as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The tafferel shone like a jewel against the dark wood of the ship's stern.
meanings.sent5: The tafferel swayed gently with the motion of the waves, a delicate ornament on the stern.

meanings.definition: A decorative panel on a ship's stern.
meanings.sent1: The tafferel was adorned with intricate patterns and designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a beautiful seascape on the tafferel of the ship.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sailor hid a love letter behind the tafferel, hoping it would be found.
meanings.sent4: The tafferel stood out against the plain wood of the ship's stern, a work of art in itself.
meanings.sent5: The tafferel seemed to come alive at night, casting playful shadows on the deck.
